Title: TYPO3 may allow editors to change, create, or delete metadata of files not within their file mounts
Description: It has been discovered, that editors with access to file meta data table could change, create or delete metadata of files which are not within their file mounts.
AffectedVersions: All versions starting from 6.2.0 before 6.2.14, all versions starting from 7.0.0 before 7.3.1
NotImpacted: All versions before 6.2.0, all versions starting from 6.2.14 before 7.0.0, all versions starting from 7.3.1
